ctx: IGo Primo (Android) problem - Out of Memory
content:
Pozdravljeni,

Naj naprej opišem glavne podatke za moj problem.
Telefon: Samsung Galaxy S2, Android 4.1.2 (Simobil, I9100BULS1), nerootan
Navigacija Software: Igo Primo 9.6.22.290143, Mar 27 2013
Navigacija je v celoti nameščena na zunanjo SD kartico (32 Gb), v direktorij IGo. Dodani so še zemljevidi za celo Evropo, POI, 3D,......

Problem se pojavi, ko pričnem z iskanjem kakšne točke in sicer preko menija Najdi – Najdi Točke – Iskanje po meri – v mestu - .......
Ko vpišem mesto in nato izberem še kaj naj poišče, mi izpiše 
ERROR
Out Of Memory
Requested: 3427255137
Cache: 444068

Program postane neaktiven (zamrzne) in po parih sekundah se IGo avtomatsko zapre.

Ali ima kdo kakšno idejo, kje bi lahko bil problem.

Hvala in LP
author: Atomic

ctx: IGo Primo (Android) problem - Out of Memory
author: Abomination1

ctx: IGo Primo (Android) problem - Out of Memory
content:
Takole izgleda sys.txt

[device]
devtype_fallback_to_model=1
type="android"

[android]
create_sdcard_dir=1
check_folders_after_rebuild=0
getdeviceid_gemini=1
has_physical_home_button=0
check_for_dead_links=1
show_status_bar=1
fullscreen=1
tablet=1

[project]
;name="igo9_android_gpsandmore"

[gps]
location_net=1
location_gps=1
;this should be in android igo9 config:
background_navigation=1
location_log=0
location_log_filename="gpslog/LocationManager"

[debug]
skip_eula=1
imei="000000000000000"
experimental_features=1
show_networkservices=1

[folders]
linked_root_list="/sdcard2/iGO /sdcard/iGO /sdcard/sd/iGO /sdcard/external_sd/iGO /mnt/sdcard/iGO /mnt/sd/iGO /mnt/iGO /storage/iGO /mnt/sdcard/sd/iGO /mnt/sdcard/external_sd/iGO /mnt/exsdcard/iGO /mnt/sdcard/extStorages/SdCard/iGO /ext_card/iGO /mnt/ext_card/iGO /mnt/extSdCard /mnt/ext_sd"
;has_secondary_root=0
;secondary_app="android_linked_root"
;user_backup_path="android_linked_root"

[rawdisplay]
driver=engine
screen_xy="auto"

[feature]
back_exit=1
back_button=1

[interface]
extra_settings=1

[other]
demo_enabled=0

[2d]
traffic_lights=1

[3d]
usepolyfarroads=0

[hnr]
ignored_missing_country_ids=*

[route]
hnr_ignored_missing_country_ids=*

[map_update_checker]
enabled=0

[poi]
picturepoi_scan="/mnt/sdcard/myPictures"
picturepoi_nonrecursive_scan="/mnt/sdcard/myPictures"

;TEMPORARY
[sound]
temp_dir=/data/data/com.nng.igoprimoisr.javaclient
csv_voice_enabled=1
ding_muted=1

[warning]
speedcam_enabled=1
speedcam_warning=1
is_spoken=0

[network]
available=1

[naviextras]
boot_service_address="http://zippy.naviextras.com/services/index/rest/2/boot"

[tmc-http]
enabled=1
start=1
servers.size=1
servers[0].url="http://zippy.naviextras.com/services/tmclite/data/nng-igo-tmc-iphone/0/"

[google]
enabled=1
start=1
servers.size=1
servers[0].url="http://zippy.naviextras.com/services/tmclite/data/nng-igo-tmc-iphone/0/"

[services]
server_addr="https://android.naviextras.com/"
